wikitext.*:
Dr. '''Jared Charles Lobdell''' (born [[29 November]] [[1937]] - [[22 March]] [[2019]]) was an American writer and teacher of Literary Criticism (and many other fields). He published several articles about various fantasy and science-fiction writers, like [[C.S. Lewis]] and George Orwell.
